duties_responsibilities.duty: Leads projects related to regulatory compliance or improving facility or enterprise process/procedures.
Researches, interprets, and recommends unique solutions to current and evolving regulatory issues.
Develops comprehensive programs to be utilized at facilities.
Monitors periodic performance reports for trends and conditions, and makes recommendations for improvement.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Environmental Health and Safety or related field (CPS, CHMM, PE, and NFPA 70E certifications are a plus)
